bill_title: exempt certain small sand, gravel, and other extraction operations from license fees and surety requirements.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain small sand, gravel, and other extraction operations from license fees and surety requirements. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 45-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any operator is exempt from paying any license fee under § § 45-6-65 and 45-6-72 and exempt from paying any surety under § 45-6-71 if: (1) At least two-thirds of the operator's total family gross income is derived from agriculture; (2) The operator is the owner of the affected land; (3) The affected land lies within or is contiguous with parcels of agricultural land owned by the operator on which a portion of the operator's agricultural income is generated; (4) The affected land is less than ten acres; and (5) The operator extracts from the affected land an average of less than twenty-five thousand tons per year of sand, gravel, and any other material specified in § 45-6-65. The average shall be calculated using the total annual amounts of sand, gravel, and other materials specified in § 45-6-65 that were extracted during the three immediately preceding calendar years.

bill_versions.bill_version: Senate Agriculture and Natural Resources Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain small sand, gravel, and other extraction operations from license fees and surety requirements. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 45-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any operator is exempt from paying any license fee under § § 45-6-65 and 45-6-72 and exempt from paying any surety under § 45-6-71 if the operator submits to the department a notarized statement that, under the penalty of perjury, the operator complies with the following criteria: (1) At least two-thirds of the operator's total family gross income is derived from agriculture; (2) The operator is the owner of the affected land; (3) The affected land lies within or is contiguous with parcels of agricultural land owned by the operator on which a portion of the operator's agricultural income is generated; (4) The affected land is less than ten acres; and (5) The operator extracts from the affected land an average of less than twenty-five thousand tons per year of sand, gravel, and any other material specified in § 45-6-65. The average shall be calculated using the total annual amounts of sand, gravel, and other materials specified in § 45-6-65 that were extracted during the three immediately preceding calendar years. The exemptions provided under this section do not exempt the operator from the requirements to obtain a license pursuant to § 45-6-65 and to file annual reports pursuant to § 45-6-72.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
